features: Dual Connectors [ USB type C+ USB 3.0 ]: The type-c port can only work on phones/tablets with OTG function.Please make sure your smartphone with OTG function and reversible type-c interface.The other end is USB 3.0 port connecting regular USB devices

Easy to Use: Plug and play, no need any drive.Used as laptop notebook tablets phones accessories,Compatible with Samsung Galaxy Note 8,Galaxy S8,Google Nexus 5X and 6P,Google Pixel XL,New Macbook Pro and more

Fast Speed:High-speed USB 3.0 flash drive for fast data transfer, backwards compatible with USB 2.0,easy to complete the storage and transport functions. You can use it to transfer your computer file or access files from Type-C devices,store and share your photos, videos and music in a simple and reliable way

Important: Default format of the drive is EXFAT as this is the format recognized by the smartphones and tablets. These drives are only compatible with C-Port enabled mobile phones & computers only. While formatting the drive keep a check on the drive format

Package: 1Pc Type C & USB Multi-function Flash Drive, 1 year warranty and outstanding customer service. Tips：We recommend that you put the mini USB flash drive into your wallet or hang it on the lanyard rather than attach on the key ring.

It lets you quickly transfer data, files, photos, videos between your Type-C phone, tablet, laptop, computer, car audio system, TV and more. KEXIN Dual USB Stick Type C is only suitable for smartphones with OTG function and USB C interface. Before buying, make sure your device is equipped with USB C and OTG function. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars a MUST for anyone who speaks often
reviews.reviewText: fantastic device. Super small--almost too small--and is the envy of other speakers I run into. You never know what connections the IT guys will or won't have and this, by virtue of having the old USB, makes this essentially universal. It's great to not have to rely on my dongle that I may or may not have left behind somewhere. It'a got great storage. Jumps between mac and PC easily. good price. highly recommend it.(I was a little concerned that having one end open would collect lint and whatever and get jammed up, but it's been fine so far)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don't have remove phone case to use
reviews.reviewText: Ilove this little usb dual. I can use it on my smart phone without having to remove phone case. Also , it has a fast transfer of data.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars HUGE space, amazing small size!
reviews.reviewText: This product works well between my devices, however it does tend to heat up pretty quickly. Wouldn't recommend using this in long durations. Other than that, works for me!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well, but overheats
reviews.reviewText: Bought for use with Mac laptop with USB C ports and various windows computers with regular USB ports. The capacity is great for me, and the form factor is tiny. It's so small I'm glad it has the metal loop, since I need to attach it to something (or attach something to it) so I don't lose it. It has worked with my Mac laptop (USB C) and various other windows and Mac computers with standard USB ports.The only issue I've encountered so far is that sometimes the transfer speeds are much lower than expected, sometimes slowing to a near stop for up to 10-15 seconds. I also noted that the drive becomes quite hot with extended file transfers. I'm guessing if it gets too hot, it throttles down or temporarily suspends file transfers until it cools to a safe temperature. This can be a problem with large file transfers, since it may slow them down substantially.Overall, I'm still fairly happy with the drive, and the issue with transfer speeds is only an annoyance. But if you regularly need to transfer gigabytes of files and absolutely need to do it quickly, I'd look for another drive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My new used car did not have cd or media card slot, just a bunch of USB-c plugs. I could have used my phone for playlist but did not want to take up that much storage on phone. Bought 2 prior media devices but did not work with my car for some reason. But third time was the charm. I just leave it plugged into slot in car and I can play music or audiobooks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2019
reviews.reviewText: So I recently bought an NVMe SSD to upgrade my main storage drive. I purchased this flash drive for the sole purpose of reformatting my computer because I couldn't find my old USB that had my flash boot files and thought this would be a perfect time to upgrade to a USB 3.0 and/or USB C flash drive. This one looked like it had great reviews, had a good look and enough storage for any file that I would come across. When I received the product, the form factor was great (it's the size of your thumb) but the product itself was defective. When I plugged in the USB, the drive registered on my PC but I immediately received an error message saying the drive was corrupted and needed to be repaired. Upon repairing the drive, the drive was no longer 128GB but became this awkward 34.3 GB drive. The 3.8GB is the flash files I installed to see if the drive would work. I DO NOT recommend this drive. This experience led me to request an immediate refund.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Sturdy and Reliable
reviews.reviewText: I am keeping this on my Keychain so it needs to be durable. The metal construction is holding up very well and works perfectly
